application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x False Acacia (applicant's ref. T1) - Reduce growth on roadside by 2m. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Oak (applicant's ref. T4) - Reduce growth on roadside by 2m. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. Mixed Species (applicant's ref. G1) - Trim foliage over entrance. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Cedar (applicant's ref. T5) - Clean out dead wood. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Oak (applicant's ref. T6) - Reduce growth on roadside by 2m. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Birch (applicant's ref. T8) - Trimming low foliage to clear car park. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Sycamore (applicant's ref. T9) - Clean out dead wood. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Sycamore (applicant's ref. T10a) - Fell to ground level. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Sycamore (applicant's ref. T15) - Remove branch in contact with substation. Remove main lateral system arising at 1.5m. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Cherry (applicant's ref. T16) - Crown lift to provide 3m headroom. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Sycamore (applicant's ref. T18) - Reduce crown by approximately 30% (reduce from 9m to 6m). Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Plane (applicant's ref. T20) - Clean out deadwood. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Beech (applicant's ref. T21) - Crown reduce/lift to clear roof by 1.5m. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Box Elder (applicant's ref. T22) - Reduce crown by 1.5m. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Sugar Maple (applicant's ref. T24) - Crown lift to 3m. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Sycamore (applicant's ref. T26) - Clean out deadwood. Thin crown by 25%. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Horse Chestnut (applicant's ref. T14) - Reduce crown to mitigate nuisance of branch encroachment. Standing in A24 of Tree Preservation Order.
